plot: Private Investigator Jackson Hobbs can't find the book Magnum P.I. said he was going to write. . .so he'll just have to write his own book on the subject of how to be a private eye.
plot_en: Private Investigator Jackson Hobbs can't find the book Magnum P.I. said he was going to write. . .so he'll just have to write his own book on the subject of how to be a private eye.
plot_es: Private Investigator Jackson Hobbs can't find the book Magnum P.I. said he was going to write. . .so he'll just have to write his own book on the subject of how to be a private eye.
title: Cobalt Blue
